title: Date with history: Hiroshima
brief_description: Shows the preliminary events leading up to the bombing of Hiroshima in August, 1945 in which 72,000 people were killed. some of the people involved are interviewed, giving their reactions to the holocaust. The film contains actual footage of the events.
